Partner.title: Partner
Partner.description: Represents a member or partner in the lending system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Partner entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the partner.

lastName.description: The last name of the partner.

identificationNumber.description: The identification number (e.g., c√©dula) of the partner.

alias.description: An alias or nickname for the partner.

email.description: The email address of the partner.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the partner.

Loan.title: Loan
Loan.description: Represents a loan issued to a partner.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Loan entity.

loanType.description: The type of loan (e.g., Standard, Custom).

totalAmount.description: The total amount of the loan.

numberOfInstallments.description: The number of installments for the loan.

interestRate.description: The interest rate for the loan (percentage or fixed).

startDate.description: The start date of the loan.

ownerId.description: The ID of the partner who owns this loan.

Installment.title: Installment
Installment.description: Represents an installment for a loan.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Installment entity.

dueDate.description: The due date for the installment.

paymentDate.description: The date when the installment was paid (if applicable).

status.description: The status of the installment (e.g., pending, paid, overdue).

capitalAmount.description: The capital amount for the installment.

interestAmount.description: The interest amount for the installment.

totalAmount.description: The total amount for the installment (capital + interest).

ownerId.description: The ID of the partner who owns this installment.

Payment.title: Payment
Payment.description: Represents a payment made for one or more installments.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Payment entity.

paymentDate.description: The actual date when the payment was made.

totalAmount.description: The total amount paid in this payment.

capitalAmount.description: The capital amount portion of the payment.

interestAmount.description: The interest amount portion of the payment.

ownerId.description: The ID of the partner who made this payment.

Receipt.title: Receipt
Receipt.description: Represents a receipt generated for a payment.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Receipt entity.

generationDate.description: The date when the receipt was generated.

amount.description: The amount paid for the installment.

ownerId.description: The ID of the partner this receipt belongs to.

Report.title: Report
Report.description: Represents a financial report, which can be filtered by different criteria.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Report entity.

startDate.description: The start date for the report period.

endDate.description: The end date for the report period.

totalAmount.description: The total amount calculated for the report (e.g., total payments, total unpaid).

generatedDate.description: The date when the report was generated.

/partners/{partnerId}.description: Stores partner information. Each document represents a partner in the lending system.

/loans/{loanId}.description: Stores loan information associated with a partner.

/installments/{installmentId}.description: Stores installment information associated with a loan. This collection can be a subcollection of loans for better data organization, e.g., /loans/{loanId}/installments/{installmentId}.

/payments/{paymentId}.description: Stores payment information associated with a partner.

/receipts/{receiptId}.description: Stores receipt information associated with a payment.
